foul up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to do something wrong or spoil something by making mistakes
foul up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We can’t afford to foul up this time.
Glen completely fouled up the seating arrangements.
foul up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make something very dirty, especially with waste
foul up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He lit a cigarette and started to foul up the air with stinging yellow smoke.
foul up.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a problem caused by a stupid or careless mistake
